Menu Configuration

Menu Configuration

Example adding menus through application properties -

sprout:
  menus:
  - name: root1
    display-text: root-1
    url: http://localhost
    children:
    - name: child1-1
      display-text: child-1-1
      url: http://localhost/child1-1
      children:
      - name: grandchild1-1
        display-text: grandchild-1-1
        url: http://localhost/child1/grandchild1-1
    - name: child1-2
      display-text: child-1-2
      url: http://localhost/child1-2
      children:
      - name: grandchild1-2
        display-text: grandchild-1-2
        url: http://localhost/child1/grandchild1-2
  - name: root2
    display-text: root-2
    url: /root2
    children:
    - name: child2-1
      display-text: child-2-1
      url: http://localhost/child2-1
      children:
      - name: grandchild2-1
        display-text: grandchild-2-1
        url: http://localhost/child1/grandchild2-1
    - name: child2-2
      display-text: child-2-2
      url: http://localhost/child2-2
      children:
      - name: grandchild2-2
        display-text: grandchild-2-2
        url: http://localhost/child1/grandchild2-2
